articles.author: Khaleda Rahman
articles.title: Joe Biden 'Asleep' at Climate Summit Sparks Wave of Criticism and Sympathy - Newsweek
articles.description: "America is in crisis, and Joe Biden is asleep at the wheel," House Republicans tweeted after a video showing Biden with his eyes closed during a speech at COP26 went viral.
articles.content:
President Joe Biden was seen on camera appearing to fall asleep during a United Nations climate change summit, prompting both criticism and sympathy.
A video posted on Twitter by Zach Purser Brown, … [+2707 chars]

articles.title: Fad diets are out. It's your lifestyle habits that matter - CNN
articles.description: A heart-healthy diet starts with your eating patterns and habits, the American Heart Association said in its new guidelines.
